about_the_game:
Intersolar Overdrive was built on a gravity algorithm that lets you experience relative travel in deep space. Follow the story line or play in arcade mode for good old fashioned points. This game combines many favorites from the 1980's including Gravitar, Space War, Space Taxi and more.

It has procedurally generated worlds and is mission based for endless variations! Enjoy the chill feeling of nailing a perfect orbit around an Asteroid, Planet, or Star or the exhilaration of destroying space pirates whilst amping up your ship with upgrades.

There are 3 modes of play, Training, Story Mode and Arcade Mode. It is recommended to run through the training to understand basic maneuvers.

Story Mode:

Play for the lowest time! You are a Space Transport Delivery Pilot working for Nebuloun Corp. Nebuloun has a mission to extract rare materials from the various solar systems it works in. It has built a central station within each operation to work from. All was well until Nebuloun operations mined too far and unleashed an evil which has never been seen before! All 16 Nebuloun operations have been shut down due to an evil that calls itself King Boss.

You, pilot, must go to each operation and complete the mission objectives provided to you. Eventually leading to destroying King Boss!

Good Luck, Pilot!

Arcade Mode:

Play for the high score! Test your meddle in a dangerous universe. Destroy enemies and complete random missions to earn extra points.

Pilot, do you have what it takes?

name: Intersolar Overdrive

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: Pentium
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any Integrated Card
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Can run on pretty much anything
